content.question: The parametric function <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> is given by <math alttext="f open parentheses t close parentheses equals open parentheses x open parentheses t close parentheses comma y open parentheses t close parentheses close parentheses"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi>y</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></math>, where <math alttext="x open parentheses t close parentheses equals 4 plus 4 cos t"><mi>x</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>cos</mi><mi>t</mi></math> and <math alttext="y open parentheses t close parentheses equals 5 plus 3 sin t"><mi>y</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>sin</mi><mi>t</mi></math> for <math alttext="0 less or equal than t less or equal than 2 pi"><mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></math>. Which of the following is an equivalent implicitly-defined function?

choices.label: <math alttext="open parentheses x minus 4 close parentheses squared over 16 plus open parentheses y minus 5 close parentheses squared over 9 equals 1"><mfrac><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>16</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>

<math alttext="open parentheses x minus 4 close parentheses squared over 16 minus open parentheses y minus 5 close parentheses squared over 9 equals 1"><mfrac><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>16</mn></mfrac><mo>-</mo><mfrac><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>

<math alttext="open parentheses x plus 4 close parentheses squared over 16 plus open parentheses y plus 5 close parentheses squared over 9 equals 1"><mfrac><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>16</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>

<math alttext="open parentheses x plus 4 close parentheses squared over 16 minus open parentheses y plus 5 close parentheses squared over 9 equals 1"><mfrac><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>16</mn></mfrac><mo>-</mo><mfrac><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open parentheses x minus 4 close parentheses squared over 16 plus open parentheses y minus 5 close parentheses squared over 9 equals 1"><mfrac><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>16</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>

unit.text: 4: Functions Involving Parameters, Vectors, and Matrices (Not assessed on the AP Exam)

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
